name: Drones
title: 无人机
title_original: Drones (remote monitor your factory from drones)
author: BinbinHfr
description: 通过你的智能终端监视并操控你的工厂。（也可以设置多个无人机来为你提供不同视野并加以操控）
description_original: Eyes in the sky ! Monitor and pilot your factory with your smartphone. (or a way to have several cameras all around the map to give you alternate views and control on your factory)
